edu.lehigh.cse.lol

Class PauseScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.lehigh.cse.lol.PauseScene

  • public class PauseScene
extends java.lang.Object
    PauseScene provides a way to suspend gameplay briefly and display information to the player. A PauseScene can include arbitrary text and pictures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PauseScene() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addBackButton(java.lang.String imgName, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Draw a picture on the PauseScene, but indicate that touching the picture will cause the level to stop playing, and control to return to the chooser.
      static void addImage(java.lang.String imgName, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Draw a picture on the PauseScene
      static void addText(java.lang.String text, int x, int y, int red, int green, int blue, java.lang.String fontName, int size)
      Draw text on the PauseScene
      static void addText(java.lang.String text, int red, int green, int blue, java.lang.String fontName, int size)
      Draw text on the PauseScene, and center the text vertically and horizontally
      static void reset()
      Clear everything off of the level's pause scene, so it can be reused
      static void show()
      Show the pause screen

      • addText

        public static void addText(java.lang.String text,
           int x,
           int y,
           int red,
           int green,
           int blue,
           java.lang.String fontName,
           int size)
        Draw text on the PauseScene
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display
        x - The X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - The Y coordinate of the bottom left corner
        red - The red component of the color (0-255)
        green - The green component of the color (0-255)
        blue - The blue component of the color (0-255)
        fontName - The name of the font to use
        size - The font size to use

            int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height)
        Draw a picture on the PauseScene
        Parameters:
        imgName - The name of the image file that should be displayed
        x - The X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - The Y coordinate of the bottom left corner
        width - The width of the image
        height - The height of the image

      • addBackButton

        public static void addBackButton(java.lang.String imgName,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Draw a picture on the PauseScene, but indicate that touching the picture will cause the level to stop playing, and control to return to the chooser.
        Parameters:
        imgName - The name of the image file that should be displayed
        x - The X coordinate of the bottom left corner
        y - The Y coordinate of the bottom left corner
        width - The width of the image
        height - The height of the image
